Comment: This is a game that I (bishop18) played when I was 14. What's interesting about it is that it looked as if I was getting attacked and in deep trouble for most of the game, but then I suddenly whipped up an attack out of nowhere to checkmate black.
The standard line is 3. Nxe5 fxe5 4. Qh5 , but since I never played that line before, I felt that it was too risky, and instead developed normally.
